definitions.definition: a small, rectangular piece of card or plastic, often with your signature, photograph, or other information proving who you are, that allows you to do something, such as make a payment, get money from a bank, or enter a particular place:
examples: I don't have any cash - can I put this on (= pay using) my (credit/charge) card?

definitions.definition: to ask someone to show you a document, especially an identity card, in order to prove how old they are
